entry.title: I Left My Heart in Wynwood
entry.summary:
Author: xbeautifulxrealityx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 732,542Chapters: 96/?Kudos: 767

Summary: A high-stakes heist in Miami should have been a straightforward job, but when you unexpectedly run into your insufferable ex, who makes you the offer of a lifetime.. things spiral out of control. Amidst a whirlwind of chaotic encounters and sizzling new flings, you’re pulled deeper into the lucrative world of alien tech development. As you juggle ambition, romance, and a web of deceit, every reckless decision sends shockwaves through your life. In a world where illusions rule and betrayal lurks at every turn, you must navigate a treacherous path to build your own empire and rise from the ashes of your past. Will you emerge victorious or be consumed by the chaos?No y/n used.*also I’ve started to edit/ rewrite some of the first chapters so yeah lol

entry.title: The Pizza Delivery Girl's Survival Guide to Gotham City
entry.summary:
Author: Morveren

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 162,468Chapters: 25/35Kudos: 9,279

Summary: People who lived outside of Gotham City would most often think of it in terms of its heroes and villains. About Batman and Robin, Joker and Harley Quinn.People who actually live in Gotham City would only think of one thing: surviving.Who cares about the people in costumes when your house has been bombed for the fifth time, or your wife has been taken hostage just because she worked in a bank?Or, in your case, when you have to make regular deliveries to places where even Batman feared to tread? Because let's face it. In a world full of superheroes and costumed villains, the real heroes are the ones who make sure that people get their pizzas in forty-five minutes or less.
